item.title: RT 499: DeTalks [CN] No.220 From Big Tech to Crypto: Career Paths, Project Research & Investment, Hands-On DeFi Time: Thursday, January 29 Â· 8:00 PM ...
item.description:
RTâ€‚499
DeTalks [CN] No.220
From Big Tech to Crypto: Career Paths, Project Research & Investment, Hands-On DeFi

Time: Thursday, January 29 Â· 8:00 PM (GMT+8)

Discover what sparked their leaps and how their PM and coding skills fueled success. We'll explore Twitter as a personal assetâ€”tips on building accounts from scratch. Discuss the Kaito ban's impact on KOLs, creator incentives, and Twitter's InfoFi evolution. Learn content creation secrets: sourcing inspiration and sustaining value. Unpack TradeFi's hype with tokenized real-world assets accelerating adoption. Gauge Web3's heat, DeFi-AI synergies, and why more internet pros might join.

Hosted by:
Memeland â€” Committee Member, 499

Featuring:
â€¢ æ’¸æ¯›å°ç‹— @LumaoDoggie â€” Former Alibaba software engineer

â€¢ å²³å°é±¼ @yuexiaoyu Web3 Product Manager

Join the Space:
https://x.com/i/spaces/1BRJjgPlkVdxw?s=20
X Community: http://x.com/i/communities/1987769956122116168
Telegram Group: http://t.me/+xMlOO3VQH-piZWNl

Weâ€™ll cover:
The ban on InfoFi platforms like Kaito: Impacts on KOLs, views on creator incentives.Becoming a content creator: Sources of inspiration and strategies for sustained valuable output.TradeFi's rise: How tokenized real-world assets on exchanges could accelerate crypto adoption through TradFi-crypto fusion.Web3's current hype: Perspectives on DeFi-AI integration and whether more traditional internet pros will jump in.The future of Web3 community ops: Will platforms like Twitter and Telegram be disrupted by new tools, and what innovations lie ahead.

item.title: RT him: In an asset class where assets die in a day, the longer it lasts, the more people will talk about it. Unlike stocks, where fundamentals matter...
item.description:
RTâ€‚him
In an asset class where assets die in a day, the longer it lasts, the more people will talk about it.

Unlike stocks, where fundamentals matter, with memes, the more people talk about it, its intrinsic value grows, unironically: memetics (attention catalysts) are all that matter.

item.description:
The Nietzschean Penguin is becoming a new kind of faith.

Most people live merely to survive, having long abandoned their dreams and will.

But this penguin is different,
it does not live because it must, but because it chooses to.

I know the world is absurd, yet I still choose to stand.

item.title: RT River: $8M Strategic investment by @justinsuntron This investment supports ecosystem integration on @trondao and the deployment of Riverâ€™s chain a...
item.description:
RTâ€‚River
$8M Strategic investment by @justinsuntron

This investment supports ecosystem integration on @trondao and the deployment of Riverâ€™s chain abstraction stablecoin infrastructure.

River connects cross ecosystem assets and liquidity into TRON through satUSD, which can be minted 1 to 1 with USDT, USDD, or USD1, or backed by assets from different chains.

This enables users to access TRON native high yield opportunities directly.

satUSD will be used in stablecoin pools alongside USDT and @usddio on @OfficialSUNio. Price feeds for satUSD will be provided by
@WinkLink_Oracle. satUSD will also be available on @DeFi_JUST for lending and borrowing.

Integration expands across core assets including USDT, TRX, wBTC, BTT, JST, SUN, WIN, and NFT use cases, with native sTRX staking yield as the initial entry point.

River will launch Smart Vault and institutional grade Prime Vault to deliver yield opportunities for stablecoins, TRX, and core ecosystem assets on TRON.

This investment reinforces Riverâ€™s role as core infrastructure for the TRON, enabling liquidity, yield, and sustained on chain activity at scale.
